title: Dont be put off by the entrance!!!
text:
The hotel entrance is no more than 10 ft from the entrance/exit to the right as you walk out of Borough Underground station. Look up to see the London City Hotel. The narrow entrance is between two shops, up the stairs to reception. Its small, its smart and you are met by very friendly folks in the office. After check in I was told to follow someone, down back the stairs and out oh dear, I thought...where now? Nothing to worry about....a couple of yards thru a coffee shop to rooms at the back! Oh dear I thought...what now!? Nothing to worry about. I was let into a very smart (small) single room, tastefully furnished, luvely bathroom....very comfortable. There is a window with a blind - no view - no problem!! Breakfast not included.
A smart hotel, in a fantastic part of the city - perfect for a couple of days.
